text: The best music is essentially there to provide you something to face the world with.
author: Bruce Springsteen

text: Music was invented to confirm human loneliness.
author: Lawrence Durrell

text: Music never dies. Do we really need another Madonna tour? Does she have to compete with women performers 25 years her junior?
author: Camille Paglia

text: Yet, it ought to be obvious that good music generally occupies a higher plane that mere politics. Great writers can express moods through melody and capture experiences we share most powerfully - love, lust, longing joy, rage, fear triumph, yearning and confusion.
author: Tony Snow

text: Every so often, I feel I should graduate to classical music, properly. But the truth is, I'm more likely to listen to rock music.
author: Tony Blair
